title: Bus Stand for Local and Regional Services / Metro station / Transport Hub - In addition to respective purpose, bus-metro reservation may have interchange along with other ancillary uses
clause_text: Bus Stand for Local and Regional Services / Metro station / Transport Hub - In addition to respective purpose, bus-metro reservation may have interchange along with other ancillary uses. Where there is / are any existing building/s accommodating owners / occupants in such reservation, they may be accommodated by the Planning Authority on upper floors of any proposed building/s on the reservation, subject to their willingness. Fire Brigade Station - Fire brigade station along with allied activities.
section: 4.27 USES PERMISSIBLE IN DEVELOPMENT PLAN RESERVATIONS

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
